summary:
•	Microsoft Professional with 8 years of experience in IT industry with Web development experience & design of 3-Tier Architecture using C#, ASP.NET, ADO.NET, LINQ, Entity Framework, 
Web Service, WCF, Web API, MVC Framework
•	Extensive knowledge of Object Oriented Programming (OOPs) concept.
•	Knowledge of Design pattern and SOLID principles. 
•	Proficient in using databases with MS SQL Server 2005/2008/2012 includes Writing SQL Queries, Stored Procedure, functions, Triggers, Views.
•	Proficient in using version control tool like TFS, Mercurial Tortoise Hg.
•	Automation tool Jenkins for Build & Deployment. VSTS for Unit Testing. Peer Review.
•	Test management tool HPALM to manage test cases, test plan, test results, defects, reports
•	SDLC phases including Requirement, Design, Coding, Implementation and Testing for complex web applications using Agile and Waterfall Methodology.
•	Expertise in Telecom and Health Insurance Domain.
•	Preparation of implementation plan for production deployment and co-ordination with interfacing components for different production release.
•	Experience in Onsite-Offshore Model
•	Extensive knowledge of working in agile team and agile ceremonies.
•	Hands-on experience with Agile Tools - Jira, Confluence etc.
•	Working knowledge in DevOps team.
•	Certified Scrum Master (CSM) with 2.5 years of experience.
•	Knowledge of ticket management system Services-Now.
•	Enthusiastic and quick to learn new Technologies and tools.
•	A good team player with good analysis, problem-solving ability, verbal and written communication.

school.name: West Bengal University of Technology, Kolkata

awards.title: Pat on Back (POB)
awards.description: Received for making the team more focused, high valued, self-sufficient and Cross-functional.

awards.title: Associate of the Month (AOM)
awards.description: Received for making Client delight several times with the Quality deliverables in time and making code automated and Reuse.

profile_positions.description:
The Regulatory Reporting Solution provides for the requirement to inform all regulatory bodies about the trading activities undertaken by Rabobank.

Responsibilities:

•	Involved in all the phases of PBI creation , poker session , Build , Unit Test and Deployment
•	Prepared analysis & design documents, estimation for different component and functional modules required by the system.
•	Performed high priority Incident analyse and fix them in production with minimum documentation.
•	Experience in creating Model using entity framework and validating model using service layer.
•	Involved in Database design, writing stored procedures, Functions, Views etc.
•	Performed Unit Testing and Integrated Testing.
•	Attended daily stand–up, Scrum ceremonies with the Team, scrum master, Product owner and Stake holders on day task details, planning based on agile methodology.
•	Coordination with different team in chain to resolve the issue in a faster way.
•	Groom new team members.

Skills                 : .Net Framework 4.5, C#, ASP.Net, Web services, Web API, Windows service, 
		     Windows Scheduled job, LINQ, Entity Framework, MVC, SQL Server 2016
profile_positions.title: Senior Application Developer

profile_positions.description:
COBS is a BSS solution for order processing and assurance support for ISP Telfort and other Wholesale ISP’s.

Responsibilities:

•	Involved in all the phases of requirements, development and deploying various packages like Web application, web service, Windows scheduled job and windows service.
•	Prepared analysis & design documents, estimation for different component and functional modules required by the system.
•	Experience in creating proper authentication and authorization specified by customer.
•	Experience in creating Model using entity framework, LINQ to SQL and validating model using service layer.
•	Involved in Database design, writing stored procedures, Functions, Views etc.
•	Preparation of Low level design documents, Object Impacted Documents & Unit Test Plan.
•	Performed bug Tracking and Reported using Quality Centre HPALM.
•	Performed Unit Testing and Integrated Testing.
•	Preparation of implementation plan for production deployment.
•	Attended daily stand–up, Scrum ceremonies with the Team, scrum master, Product owner and Stake holders on day task details, planning based on agile methodology.
•	Coordination with different team in chain to resolve the issue in a faster way.
•	Groom new team members.

Skills                 : .Net Framework 3.5/4.0, C#, ASP.Net, Web services, Web API, Windows service, 
		     Windows Scheduled job, LINQ, Entity Framework, MVC, SQL Server 2012
profile_positions.title: Senior Application Developer @kpn , TechMahindra

profile_positions.description:
The scope of the project is to provide the entire support and maintenance to the applications (iLinkBlue, GCS, Internet and Intranet) and Databases being used by various business units and IT within BCBSLA. Major projects like -
HIPAA5010 electronic transaction to conduct electronic eligibility checking claims submission and remittance, claims status and referral management, among others mandate by U.S. Secretary of Health and Human Services.
The National Consumer Cost Tool (NCCT) initiative, a BCBSA Consumer Transparency mandate which will allow provider and members to view cost estimates, data reports for specific healthcare services associated with their location.

Responsibilities:

•	Understanding Requirements prepare Technical Design documents and incorporate them into Code Development. 
•	Implemented different reusable object oriented layers (Presentation Layer, Business Layer, Data Access Layer) allowing each layer to work independently of the other to produce a robust System.
•	Design and implementing User Interface using HTML, JavaScript, JQuery, CSS.
•	Perform XML Data validation against Database and Web service.
•	Involved in Database design, writing stored procedures and Functions.
•	Development and Maintenance of ETL Process using SSIS, SSRS, Crystal Reports.
•	Unit testing, integration and regression testing as well as Peer review performed.
•	Good knowledge of SDLC phases of Waterfall Methodology.
•	Onsite-Off shore Co-ordination and mentored new team members.
•	Participated in Implementation plan and deployment activity.

Skills:   Net Framework 3.5, C#, ASP.Net, HTML, JavaScript, JQuery, JSON, Web services, 
                Windows service, Windows Scheduled job, LINQ, SQL Server 2005/2008, 
                 SSIS, SSRS, Crystal Reports, TFS.
